title: ollama/ollama
summary: Ollama’s official CLI and server for running Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other GGUF models locally with one command.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for the Ollama API—chat, generate, pull, and manage models in Node or browsers.

title: ollama-python
summary: First-party Python client and asyncio bindings for chatting, generating, and embedding with local Ollama models.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package that wraps Ollama as a local LLM provider for chains, agents, and retrieval pipelines.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich ChatGPT-style web UI for Ollama—multi-model chats, code highlighting, RAG, and user management.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Lightweight repo showing how to build a RAG pipeline with Ollama embeddings and Chroma vector store.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Community-built interactive CLI with tab completion, conversation history, and prompt templates for Ollama.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that turns any Ollama model into a local GitHub Copilot alternative with inline completions.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration letting you use Ollama models as generators or embedders in production-ready pipelines.

title: ollama-cookbook
summary: Community recipes for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes, Raspberry Pi, M1 GPU, and integrating with Slack bots.

title: ollama-npm-bridge
summary: npm mirror of ollama-js providing the same TypeScript client for browser and Node users.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU support and horizontal scaling.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Unofficial but actively maintained Rust crate for interacting with the Ollama REST API via async/await.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Self-hostable Discord bot that lets users chat with any local Ollama model through slash commands.

title: ollama-streamlit
summary: Minimal Streamlit chat app that connects to Ollama and demonstrates streaming responses and model switching.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin that adds an AI sidebar powered by any Ollama model for summarizing notes and Q&A.

title: ollama-telegram
summary: Telegram bot that proxies chats to Ollama with per-user model selection and conversation memory.

title: ollama-fastapi
summary: FastAPI microservice template that exposes additional authentication, rate-limiting, and logging on top of Ollama.

title: ollama-go
summary: Community Go client library with idiomatic interfaces for chat, generate, pull, and list operations.

title: ollama-docker-compose
summary: Reference docker-compose stacks bundling Ollama with WebUI, Chroma, and Redis for quick local development.
